posts.post_content:
I have a few heavily trimmed beaters for sale/trade.  Looking for HOFers but I know I won't get much.  Maybe just looking for some offer for the bunch.  I got these at a yard sale and really am only collecting the HOFers for now.  Let me know if someone wants to make me an offer to buy or for trade.

Abbaticchio - Pittsburg - SOLD
J.J. Clarke - Cleveland - SOLD
Criss - St. Louis
Evans - St. Louis
Hinchman - Cleveland
Jacklitsch - Phila
White - Chicago 

5 left.  $30 for the bunch - shipped.

Thanks for looking.
Payment sent on Abbaticchio and Clarke.  Thanks!
THanks for the payment.  Cards going out in about an hour.
